book.title: The Child in Human Progress
book.description: 简介： THIS is a new sort of book, and unique. That is why I look upon the permission to write a brief preface for it as a rare privilege. Writings on children are frequent. When, in 1875, I contributed, for Karl Gerhardts immense Handbuch, my Hygiene of th...
